title: Senior Software Engineer
html:
About Eoracle

Eoracle is a pioneering company tackling the critical challenge of integrating real-world data with blockchain technology. Our solutions are designed to enhance the security, efficiency, and scalability of decentralized applications through innovative oracle systems using EigenLayer Restaking. Join us to contribute to the development of cutting-edge software that bridges the gap between blockchain and external data sources.

Role Overview

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to lead the design and development of our complex and high-quality software systems. Our architecture, built on microservices, interacts with the blockchain and various external systems, adhering to strict performance, resilience, and security standards. Our development stack includes Python and C++, embracing continuous delivery and automated testing practices.

Responsibilities

  • Design and develop high-performance software across algorithms, application logic, and infrastructure.
  • Contribute to the architecture and implementation of microservices that interface with blockchain technologies and external data sources.
  • Ensure software meets demanding requirements for performance, resilience, and security.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions for Eoracle's oracle systems.

Requirements

  • A minimum of 3 years of development experience in high-level object-oriented languages, with a preference for Python and C++.
  • A University degree in Computer Science (with a high GPA).
  • Proven track record in building complex, high-scale, and high-performance software systems.
  • Innate curiosity and a capacity for rapid learning.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Deep understanding of advanced OOP principles and design patterns.
  • Experience with performance optimization in software development.
  • Familiarity with the Linux operating system, including its internals and ecosystem.
  • Proficiency in working with NoSQL databases at scale and implementing services within a microservice architecture.
  • Experience with development tools and frameworks such as Kubernetes, Docker, Kafka, and Flask.
  • Knowledge in algorithm development, cryptographic primitives and protocols, and blockchain technologies.
  • Proficient with CI/CD and TDD methodologies.

title: OnChain - Sr. Software Engineer
html:
About Eoracle

Eoracle is a pioneering company tackling the critical challenge of integrating real-world data with blockchain technology. Our solutions are designed to enhance the security, efficiency, and scalability of decentralized applications through innovative oracle systems using EigenLayer Restaking. Join us to contribute to the development of cutting-edge software that bridges the gap between blockchain and external data sources.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Engage with product managers, business team, and other stakeholders to improve Eoracle services
  • Develop and implement Eoracle smart contract development across all relevant chains
  • Develop and implement strategies to optimize performance of Eoracle blockchain
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support blockchain best solutions
  • Provide insight on best practices developing secured, efficient and scalable smart contract

Requirements

  • At least 5 years of hands-on experience in designing and implementing secure, efficient, and scalable smart contracts
  • Proficiency in Solidity programming language
  • Proficiency with openzeplin libararies
  • Experience with decentralized applications (DApps) development
  • Knowledge of Golang and Golang Ethereum libraries
  • Understanding of token standards (e.g., ERC-20, ERC-721) and their implementations

The Ideal candidate

The ideal candidate is someone who worked on either bridging, oracles, or other complicated Dapps (over 10 smart contracts interacting with each other), worked on cross chains.

The ideal candidate should also have experience in deploying, maintaining, upgrading smart contracts in mainnet.

The ideal candidate passed audits review and have the security mindset when developing. The ideal candidate doesn’t afraid to jump into unknown area and learn it.

In addition the ideal candidate has great soft skills and ability to work in high pressure, and agile startup.

Experience that is relevant to us

  • Oracles and bridges
  • EVM Chains L1s and L2s
  • Dapps with smart contract in production especially lending markets, derivatives markets, prediction markets
  • Smart contracts auditing
  • Core protocol devs
  • Blockchain clients (like Nethermind, lighthouse, prysm…)
